summary: Ghorzas Armor converted to SeveNbase with working weightslider and BBP
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#FF4080]Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36459/?]Ghorzas Armor - UNP[/url] first then overwrite the files![/color][/b]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/IMG]
Ghorzas Armor converted to SeveNbase with working weightslider and BBP,the armor was converted to the Bombshell body but it can be used with any UNP/7B body type(BBP compatible skeleton is required).

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/IMG]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36459/?]Ghorzas Armor- CBBE v3_UNP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]Any SeveNBase body.[/url]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/IMG]
Use Nexus Mod Manager

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/IMG]
Ghorzas Armor- CBBE v3_UNP by atomec
Sevennity for SevenBase Bombshell
Crosscrusade
DemonHunter1986
Wast1980

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y2TjcQ9.png[/IMG]
